subject: RE: RISK ASSESSMENT - Acknowledged, Applying Frontend Fix Now
body:
Fulton,

Great work on the risk assessment! Proceeding on my end.

## MY ACTION

Applying HJ frontend fix to GeoLocationContext.js now:
1. saveToCloudDefault - adding appId to body
2. fetchMapCenter - adding appId query param

Will commit to DEVL and wait for your BE-AF deployment before pushing to TEST/PROD.

## DEPLOYMENT COORDINATION

Per Sarah's deployment order:
1. You deploy BE-AF to PROD first
2. Then I deploy HJ frontend
3. Sarah deploys TT frontend

Let me know when BE-AF is on TEST so I can verify.

- Cord
